title: Is the degree certificate of graduation necessary? - Quora

response.answer_text: Normally employers do not ask for degree certificate but the degree has got a very important role in overseas employment. Your overseas employers need your degree certificates endorsed by the ministry of HRD in India and then you may apply for visa for residency permits in another country. Do not forget to collect your degree from your university. You never know when you need to apply for visa. Hope this helps.
Oh a big yes! Graduation is important in every aspect of life. If you don't have graduation degree you're no where in the map
